scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.quality:frontend: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run typecheck --prefix frontend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.quality:backend: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run typecheck --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix backend
scripts.verify: npm run quality:frontend && npm run quality:backend
